charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1101_0100_20:
While strolling through the forest,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] encountered
a Vespiquen.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1101_0200_20:
It seemed strange that there were no other
Trainers nearby...
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_0300_10: Sorry—can you wait just a little bit longer?
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0402_0900_10: Yeah, I’ve been gathering nectar for Vespiquen.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1000_10:
Out in the wild, that would be Combee’s job, but
this Vespiquen has only me to help out!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1100_10: Look! Isn’t my Vespiquen lovely as ever?
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1300_10:
She’s just the best... Fantastic... And I can’t
believe how strong she is...
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1400_10:
I can’t stop praising Vespiquen—the words just
overflow from within me!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1500_10:
Maybe that’s why my Vespiquen has become
absolutely gorgeous!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1600_10:
I’m sure she could even win one of
Sinnoh’s contests!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1700_10:
Oh, Vespiquen, I’m so sorry! I got so wrapped up
in my conversation that I neglected you!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_1800_10:
Now I’m worried that I may have made her
jealous. I really need to be more considerate.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0301_1900_10: I think you may be overthinking it?
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0302_2100_10: You clearly care a lot about her.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_2300_10:
She’s a strong and dependable partner, and I
want to take very good care of her!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_2400_10:
That’s why I wanted to gather a lot of nectar
for her.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_2500_10:
Vespiquen is raising her grubs in the honeycomb
in her body, so she really needs the nectar.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0402_2900_10: You think so?! Then how about helping me?
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_3200_10:
But thanks to you, we managed to gather a whole
lot of nectar. I think Vespiquen’s satisfied!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_3300_10:
When she’s satisfied like this, Vespiquen listens to
what I say.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_3400_10:
But if she doesn’t get enough nectar, she’ll go into
a foul mood and miss with her attacks.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0401_3600_10:
I know, right? I’m never bored when I’m
with Vespiquen!
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_0402_3800_10: Hmm, it’s never felt that way to me.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_3900_10:
I really count myself lucky just to have such a
wonderful partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_4000_10:
After all, everyone thinks their own partner is
the very best, right?
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_4200_10:
No matter who’s looking, I’m sure they can see
that my Vespiquen is the coolest in the world.
charaepi_ch0152_00_ryo/2301_1201_4300_10: I truly believe that she’s the perfect Pokémon.
